summary: The Guarding Unprotected Aging Retirees from Deception (GUARD) Act aims to combat elder financial fraud, pig butchering, and general financial fraud. It allows state, local, and tribal law enforcement to use eligible federal grant funds for investigations, training, and technology. The bill defines various types of fraud, mandates reports to Congress on the state of scams and the effectiveness of enforcement actions, and enables federal agencies to assist local law enforcement, particularly regarding blockchain tracing tools.
